description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Sliding puzzle game. Merge identical monsters to create a new one with an extra eye. Can you reach the fabled 11 eye monster? If you liked 2048 you'll love Merge-A-Monster. Includes global scoreboards.
description.short: Sliding puzzle game. Merge identical monsters to create a new one with an extra eye. Can you reach the fabled 11 eye monster? If you liked 2048 you'll love Merge-A-Monster. Includes global scoreboards.
